clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Dexamethasone as Analgesic Treatment After Total Knee Arthroplasty
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Dexamethasone as Analgesic Treatment After Total Knee Arthroplasty: Subgroup Analyses of The DEX-2-TKA Randomized Clinical Trial

collaborator.agency: Copenhagen Trial Unit, Center for Clinical Intervention Research

brief_summary.textblock: Effect of Dexamethasone as Analgesic Treatment After Total Knee Arthroplasty: Subgroup Analyses of The DEX-2-TKA Randomized Clinical Trial This explorative post-hoc analysis is a substudy of the DEX-2-TKA-trial (NCT03506789) investigating diffefferent subgroups of the patients included in the main trial.

detailed_description.textblock: Effect of Dexamethasone as Analgesic Treatment After Total Knee Arthroplasty: Subgroup Analyses of The DEX-2-TKA Randomized Clinical Trial This explorative post-hoc analysis is a substudy of the DEX-2-TKA-trial (NCT03506789) investigating diffefferent subgroups of the patients included in the main trial.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Cumulative usage of morphine 0-48 hours postoperatively
primary_outcome.description: Morphine administered both as patient-controlled analgesia (PCA) i.v. morphine 0-24 hours and oral morphine on demand 24-48 hours, and any other supplemental morphine administered postoperatively. Consumption in mg

other_outcome.measure: Subgroup analysis on heterogeneity in intervention effect of age
Subgroup analysis on heterogeneity in intervention effect of sex
Subgroup analysis on heterogeneity in intervention effect of ASA group
other_outcome.description: ASA group classification: I+II vs. III

other_outcome.measure: Subgroup analysis on heterogeneity in intervention effect of preoperative pain at rest
Subgroup analysis on heterogeneity in intervention effect of preoperative pain when active
Subgroup analysis on heterogeneity in intervention effect of type of anesthesia
other_outcome.description: Type of anesthesia: spinal vs. general Anesthesia+Converted to general anesthesia

other_outcome.measure: Subgroup analysis on heterogeneity in intervention effect of prior daily use (last month) of analgesic medication
other_outcome.description: Prior daily use of paracetamol or NSAID: either parecetamol or NSAID vs. neither parecetamol or NSAID

arm_group.description: 24 mg dexamethasone i.v. perioperatively and 24 mg dexamethasone i.v. on the first postoperative day
24 mg dexamethasone i.v. perioperatively and placebo (isotonic saline) i.v. on the first postoperative day
Placebo (isotonic saline) i.v. perioperatively and placebo (isotonic saline) i.v. on the first postoperative day

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participation in the DEX-2-TKA-trial
